item.title: VS Code makeover
item.description: Visual Studio Code is a fabulous and flexible editor. Here are some things I’ve added, which you might like too. Editing settings.json When you go to File > Preferences > Settings, all the options you see are stored in a file called settings.json. Enabling or changing some options requires editing the file directly. In this case, you can scroll down the settings page until you find a link called Edit in settings.
